trends: There have been 15 other sightings in San Clemente
There were no other sightings in San Clemente on or around September 3rd 2013
Summary: I was drawn to go outsidem where I saw an orb like light in the NW sky over ocean. It looked like a cell looks under microscope, and at time seemed more like a group of small fluid circles. Stayed in sam location for 2 nights.
divs: Sighting DetailsIn the evening of September 3rd , I was drawn to my back patio and immediately look up to the sky. I witnessed a light in the North West sky over the ocean, it was larger than any lights I have seen previously. It stayed in the same location for hours. Through my binoculars it look similar to a cell under the microscope. Fluid resembles an orb, with pulsating colors. The following night it was still in the same location.
